Sinesis and Sinister came to the People's Base.

"Out new group is...Team Ultima!" Dracona said. Sinesis and Sinister high
fived at the coolness of it. The Radicons walked up.

"We wish to join." Stranato said. Dracona gave them access. Dracona set
Plintissa on enemy to be stunned but not terminated. Plintissa came to the
base with Artist, going through the secret passageway right up to the door
of the base. Plintissa opened her mouth the say something and the base fired
at her, she leaped out of the way. Artist grabbed Plintissa and ran.
Plintissa squeezed out of Artists' grip. Plintissa and Artist walked to a
grassy plain and seen Team Ultima.

"Dracona, something's wrong with the base, it fired at me and Artist."
Plintissa said.

"Why are they back again?" Plintissa asked, pointing at Sinesis, Sinister,
and the Radicons. Dracona laughed and fired at Artist and Plintissa. Sinesis
and Sinister started firing as well. The Radicons said something and started
to fire, but noboody but the Radicons could hear what they said. Plintissa
and Artist were knocked over by the barrage of shots...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@...>

Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 5:45 PM
Subject: Neo Beast Wars


> Megatron:
>
>
>
>
> Megatron sighed. He wasn't going to wait for the others to watch over the
> Predacon cave. He would have to just go ahead and go about his business.
>
> He knew Hell Beast was gone, and that meant that he was to return true
> leader to the rest of the Predacons. He transformed to beast mode,
activated
> his flight mode, and flew off.
